Key Match Events: Germany have been unbeaten in their last six home games; Germany secured a 2-0 win over Hungary in their last encounter
Pre-Game Insights: Germany are going through a big transition period after several senior players retired; Hungary aim to bounce back from a disappointing Euro 2024; Germany's new generation includes Florian Wirtz, Jamal Musiala, and Joshua Kimmich as captain; Hungary rely on Dominik Szoboszlai for goals and leadership
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the first for Germany in the new era; Hungary's predicted lineup includes Dominik Szoboszlai as captain; the match is followed by other Premier League fixtures; the match is available to watch on various broadcasters
Others: Germany vs Hungary is part of League A Group 3 of the UEFA Nations League
